text: 34 (1) The Minister may, in accordance with the regulations, declare that a foreign national is inadmissible on grounds of
norm_text: 34 (1) The Minister may, in accordance with the regulations, declare that a foreign national is inadmissible on grounds of

text: (a) on the basis that they have been convicted in Canada of an offence under an Act of Parliament punishable by way of indictment, or of two or more offences under any Act of Parliament that, in aggregate, make up a term of imprisonment of at least two years;
norm_text: (a) on the basis that they have been convicted in Canada of an offence under an Act of Parliament punishable by way of indictment, or of two or more offences under any Act of Parliament that, in aggregate, make up a term of imprisonment of at least two years;

text: (b) on the basis that they have been convicted of an offence outside Canada that, if committed in Canada, would constitute an offence under an Act of Parliament punishable by way of indictment, or of two or more such offences that, in aggregate, make up a term of imprisonment of at least two years;
norm_text: (b) on the basis that they have been convicted of an offence outside Canada that, if committed in Canada, would constitute an offence under an Act of Parliament punishable by way of indictment, or of two or more such offences that, in aggregate, make up a term of imprisonment of at least two years;

text: (c) of constituting a danger to the public in Canada or for being likely to engage in serious criminal activity.
norm_text: (c) of constituting a danger to the public in Canada or for being likely to engage in serious criminal activity.

norm_text: 34 (2) The Minister may, in accordance with the regulations, declare that a foreign national is inadmissible on the basis of

text: 15.1 (1) The Regulations shall be made within the following period:
norm_text: 15.1 (1) The Regulations shall be made within the following period:

text: (a) in the case of the initial set of Regulations, within three years after the day on which this section comes into force; and
norm_text: (a) in the case of the initial set of Regulations, within three years after the day on which this section comes into force; and;

text: (b) in the case of any other Regulations, within three years after the day on which they are required to be made.
norm_text: (b) in the case of any other Regulations, within three years after the day on which they are required to be made.
